name: Gin Rummy! Lite
description:
Play a great game of Gin Rummy!

The lite version allows you to play against the easiest opponent.

Within the game, you can sort the cards in your hand however you want. The game interface is intuitive and very easy to use.

New Players: If you are unfamiliar with how to play Gin Rummy, this game includes a full tutorial along with the complete rules of the game.

Features Include:
- Awards for winning
- Easily sortable hand
- Statistics
- Easy to use and intuitive interface
- Tutorial
